mapper.select: SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, hire_date, job_id, salary, commission_pct, manager_id, department_id FROM EMPLOYEES
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, hire_date, job_id, salary, commission_pct, manager_id, department_id FROM EMPLOYEES WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employee_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEES (employee_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, hire_date, job_id, salary, commission_pct, manager_id, department_id) VALUES ( #{employee_id}, #{first_name}, #{last_name}, #{email}, #{phone_number}, #{hire_date}, #{job_id}, #{salary}, #{commission_pct}, #{manager_id}, #{department_id} )
